comments.en:
This is a set of UPP files for the Canon BJC-8200 which comes with Ghostscript 6.50 or newer. It supports several modes up to the highest resolution on photo papers. Gimp-Print also supports this model, but it is not known which driver gives the better results.

The documentation to this driver (see driver's web page) tells that with this driver the maximum printout quality is reached, even it supports only 4-ink printing, but the Windows driver also uses only four inks in its highest quality modes.

UPP files of this driver: bj8gc12f.upp, bj8hg12f.upp, bj8oh06n.upp, bj8pa06n.upp, bj8pp12f.upp, bj8ts06n.upp
